model.chip_description:
Ultra-Low Power Mixed Signal Microcontroller FEATURES (based on SLAS753E) - Supply Voltage range: 1.8V to 3.6V - Ultra Low Power Consumption - Five Power Saving Modes - 16 bit RISC architecture - Two 16 bit timers - Touch sensing support - Universal Serial Communication Interface (UART, LIN, IrDA, SPI, I2C™) - Analog Comparator - 10 bit 200ksps ADC - Brownout Detection - Serial Onboard Programming - Spy-Bi-Wire debugging interface
Complete guide available on TI's website: MSP430x2xx Family User’s Guide (SLAU144)

field.name: DCOx
field.description: DCO frequency select.

field.name: MODx
field.description: Modulator selection.

field.name: XT2OFF
field.description: High state turns XT2 oscillator off

field.name: XTS
field.description: LFXT mode select. Not always supported, see User's Guide SLAU144I

field.name: DIVAx
field.description: Divider for ACLK (0: /1; 1: /2; 2: /4; 3: /8)

field.name: RSELx
field.description: Range select. Sixteen different frequency ranges are available

field.name: SELMx
field.description: MCLK selection bit. 0,1: DCOCLK; 2: XT2CLK w XT2, LFXT1CLK or VLOCLK w/o XT2; 3: LFXT1CLK or VLOCLK

field.name: DIVMx
field.description: Divider for MCLK (0: /1; 1: /2; 2: /4; 3: /8)

field.name: SELS
field.description: This bit selects the SMCLK source (0: DCOCLK; 1; LFXT1CLK)

field.name: DIVSx
field.description: Divider for SMCLK (0: /1; 1: /2; 2: /4; 3: /8)

field.name: XT2Sx
field.description: XT2 range select. 0: 0.4-1MHz crystal/resonator; 1: 1-3MHz crystal/resonator; 2: 3-16MHz crystal/resonator; 3: 0.4-16MHz external digital clock source.

field.name: LFXT1Sx
field.description: Low-frequency clock select and LFXT1 range select.

field.name: XCAPx
field.description: Oscillator capacitor selection. 0: 1pF; 1: 6pF; 2: 10pF; 3: 12.5pF

field.name: XT2OF
field.description: READ-ONLY! XT2 oscillator fault.

field.name: LFXT1OF
field.description: READ-ONLY! LFXT1 oscillator fault.

field.name: ACCVIE
field.description: Flash memory access violation interrupt enable

field.name: NMIIE
field.description: NMI interrupt enable

field.name: OFIE
field.description: Oscillator fault interrupt enable

field.name: WDTIE
field.description: Watchdog timer interrupt enable

field.name: UCA0TXIE
field.description: USCI_B0 Tx interrupt enable

field.name: UCA0RXIE
field.description: USCI_B0 Rx interrupt enable

field.name: UCA0TXIE
field.description: USCI_A0 Tx interrupt enable

field.name: UCA0RXIE
field.description: USCI_A0 Rx interrupt enable

field.name: NMIIFG
field.description: NMI interrupt flag

field.name: OFIFG
field.description: Oscillator fault interrupt flag

field.name: WDTIFG
field.description: Watchdog timer interrupt flag

field.name: UCB0TXIFG
field.description: USCI_B0 Tx interrupt flag

field.name: UCB0RXIFG
field.description: USCI_B0 Rx interrupt flag

field.name: UCA0TXIFG
field.description: USCI_A0 Tx interrupt flag

field.name: UCA0RXIFG
field.description: USCI_A0 Rx interrupt flag

field.name: WDTPW
field.description: Watchdog timer password (always read 069h, must be written as 05Ah)

field.name: WDTHOLD
field.description: Watchdog timer hold

field.name: WDTNMIES
field.description: Watchdog timer NMI edge select (0: rising; 1: falling)

field.name: WDTNMI
field.description: nRST/NMI pin function select (0: reset; 1: NMI)

field.name: WDTTMSEL
field.description: Watchdog timer mode select (0: watchdog mode; 1: interval timer mode

field.name: WDTCNTCL
field.description: Watchdog timer counter clear (always reads 0)

field.name: WDTSSEL
field.description: Watchdog timer clock source select (0: SMCLK; 1: ACLK)

field.name: WDTISx
field.description: Watchdog timer interval select (0: /64; 1: /512; 2: /8192; 3: /32768)

field.name: FLKEY
field.description: FCTLx password (always read 096h, must be written as 05Ah)

field.name: BLKWRT
field.description: Block write mode enable (0: disable; 1: enable)

field.name: WRT
field.description: Write mode enable (0: disable; 1: enable)

field.name: EEIX
field.description: Emergency Exit Interrupt Enable

field.name: EEI
field.description: Erase Interrupt enable

field.name: MERAS
field.description: Mass erase

field.name: FLKEY
field.description: FCTLx password (always read 096h, must be written as 05Ah)

field.name: FSSELx
field.description: Flash Controller clock source select. 0: ACLK; 1: MCLK; 2,3: SMCLK

field.name: FNx
field.description: Flash Controller clock divider /(FNx+1)

field.name: FLKEY
field.description: FCTLx password (always read 096h, must be written as 05Ah)

field.name: FAIL
field.description: Operation failure flag. Must be reset by software

field.name: LOCKA
field.description: SegmentA and Info lock. Write a 1 to this bit to change its state. Writing 0 has no effect.

field.name: EMEX
field.description: Emergency exit (0: No emergency exit ; 1: Emergency exit)

field.name: LOCK
field.description: Lock. This bit unlocks the flash memory for writing or erasing (0: Unlocked; 1: Locked)

field.name: WAIT
field.description: Wait. Indicates the flash memory is being written to (0: The flash memory is not ready for the next byte/word write; 1: The flash memory is ready for the next byte/word write

field.name: ACCVIFG
field.description: Access Violation Interrupt flag

field.name: KEYV
field.description: Flash security key violation flag. Must be reset by software

field.name: BUSY
field.description: Flash timing generator busy flag

field.name: TASSELx
field.description: Timer-A clock source select (0: TACLK; 1: ACLK; 2: SMCLK; 3: INCLK)

field.name: MCx
field.description: Mode control (0: stop mode; 1: up mode; 2: continuous mode; 3: up/down mode)

field.name: TACLR
field.description: Timer-A clear

field.name: TAIE
field.description: Timer-A interrupt enable

field.name: TAIFG
field.description: Timer-A interrupt flag

field.name: CMx
field.description: Capture mode (0: no capture; 1: rising edge; 2: falling edge; 3: both edges)

field.name: CCISx
field.description: Capture/compare input select (0: CCIxA; 1: CCIxB; 2: GND; 3: Vcc)

field.name: SCS
field.description: Synchronize capture source

field.name: SCCI
field.description: Synchronize capture/compare input

field.name: CAP
field.description: Capture mode (0: compare mode; 1: capture mode)

field.name: OUTMODx
field.description: Output mode (0: OUT bit value; 1: Set; 2: toggle/reset; 3: set/reset; 4: toggle; 5: reset; 6: toggle/set; 7: reset/set)

field.name: CCIE
field.description: Capture/compare interrupt enable

field.name: CCI
field.description: Capture/compare input

field.name: COV
field.description: Capture overflow

field.name: CCIFG
field.description: Capture/compare interrupt flag

field.name: CMx
field.description: Capture mode (0: no capture; 1: rising edge; 2: falling edge; 3: both edges)

field.name: CCISx
field.description: Capture/compare input select (0: CCIxA; 1: CCIxB; 2: GND; 3: Vcc)

field.name: SCS
field.description: Synchronize capture source

field.description: Synchronize capture/compare input

field.description: Output mode (0: OUT bit value; 1: Set; 2: toggle/reset; 3: set/reset; 4: toggle; 5: reset; 6: toggle/set; 7: reset/set)

field.name: SCS
field.description: Synchronize capture source

field.name: SCCI
field.description: READ-ONLY! Synchronize capture/compare input

field.name: CAP
field.description: Capture mode (0: compare mode; 1: capture mode)

field.name: OUTMODx
field.description: Output mode (0: OUT bit value; 1: Set; 2: toggle/reset; 3: set/reset; 4: toggle; 5: reset; 6: toggle/set; 7: reset/set)

field.description: Capture/compare interrupt enable

field.description: READ-ONLY! Capture/compare input

field.name: COV
field.description: Capture overflow

field.name: CCIFG
field.description: Capture/compare interrupt flag

field.name: TA0IV
field.description: 00h: No interrupt pending; 02h: capture/compare 1; 04h: capture/compare 2; 0Ah: timer overflow;

field.name: TASSELx
field.description: Timer-A clock source select (0: TACLK; 1: ACLK; 2: SMCLK; 3: INCLK)

field.name: MCx
field.description: Mode control (0: stop mode; 1: up mode; 2: continuous mode; 3: up/down mode)

field.name: TACLR
field.description: Timer-A clear

field.name: TAIE
field.description: Timer-A interrupt enable

field.name: TAIFG
field.description: Timer-A interrupt flag

field.description: Capture mode (0: no capture; 1: rising edge; 2: falling edge; 3: both edges)

field.name: SCS
field.description: Synchronize capture source

field.description: Synchronize capture/compare input

field.description: Capture/compare interrupt enable

field.name: SCCI

field.description: Capture mode (0: compare mode; 1: capture mode)

field.name: OUTMODx
field.description: Output mode (0: OUT bit value; 1: Set; 2: toggle/reset; 3: set/reset; 4: toggle; 5: reset; 6: toggle/set; 7: reset/set)

field.name: CCIE
field.description: Capture/compare interrupt enable

field.name: CCI
field.description: READ-ONLY! Capture/compare input

field.name: COV
field.description: Capture overflow

field.name: CCIFG
field.description: Capture/compare interrupt flag

field.name: TA1IV
field.description: 00h: No interrupt pending; 02h: capture/compare 1; 04h: capture/compare 2; 0Ah: timer overflow;

field.name: UCPEN
field.description: Parity enable bit (0: parity disabled; 1: parity enabled)

field.name: UCPAR
field.description: Parity selection bit (0: odd; 1: even)

field.name: UCMSB
field.description: MSB first select (0: LSB first; 1: MSB first)

field.name: UC7BIT
field.description: Character length (0: 7 bit; 1: 8 bit)

field.name: UCSPB
field.description: Stop bit select (0: one; 1: two)

field.name: USCIMODEx
field.description: USCI mode: 0 UART; 1: idle-line multprocessor; 2: address-line multiprocessor; 3: UART with automatic baud rate detection

field.name: UCSYNC
field.description: Synchronous mode enable (0: asynchronous; 1: synchronous)

field.name: UCSSELx
field.description: USCI clock source select(0: UCLK; 1: ACLK; 2,3: SMCLK)

field.name: UCRXEIE
field.description: Receive erroneous-character interrupt enable (0: erroneous characters rejected; 1: erroneous characters set interrupt flag

field.name: UCBRKIE
field.description: Receive break character interrupt-enable (0: disabled; 1: enabled)

field.name: UCDORM
field.description: Dormant. (0: All received characters will set UCAxRXIFG; 1: Dormant. Only characters that are preceded by an idle-line or with address bit set will set UCAxRXIFG. In UART mode with automatic baud rate detection only the combination of a breakand synch field will set UCAxRXIFG.

field.name: UCTXADDR
field.description: Transmit address: next frame to be transmitted will be marked an address (0: transmit data; 1: transmit address)

field.name: UCTXBRK
field.description: Transmit break (0: Next frame transmitted is not a break; 1: Next frame transmitted is a break or a break/synch) See User's guide for details

field.name: UCSRST
field.description: Software reset enable (0: USCI released for operation; 1: USCI held reset)

field.name: UCBRSx
field.description: First modulation stage select. Ignored with UCOS16=0

field.name: UCBRSx
field.description: Second modulation stage select.

field.name: UCOS16
field.description: Oversampling mode enable (0: disable; 1: enable)

field.name: UCLISTEN
field.description: Listen (loopback) mode enable. (0: disable; 1: enable. UCAxTXD is internally fed back to the receiver)

field.name: UCFE
field.description: Framing error flag (0: no error; 1: character received with low stop bit)

field.name: UCOE
field.description: Overrun error flag (0: no error; 1: overrun error occured) This bit is set when a character is transferred into UCAxRXBUF before the previouscharacter was read. UCOE is cleared automatically when UCxRXBUF is read, and must not be cleared bysoftware. Otherwise, it will not function correctly.

field.name: UCPE
field.description: Parity error flag (0: no error; 1: character received with parity error)

field.name: UCBRK
field.description: Break detect flag (0: no break condition; 1: break condidtion occured)

field.name: UCRXERR
field.description: Global receive error flag. One or more other error flags should also set. UCRXERR is cleared when UCAxRXBUF is read.

field.name: UCIDLE/UCADDR
field.description: If idle-line mode selected: when 1 idle line detected; If addres-bit mode selected: 0: received charater is data; 1: received charater is address

field.name: UCBUSY
field.description: READ-ONLY! UCBUSY=1 indicates active transmit or receive operation

register.name: UCA0ABCTL
register.description: USCI_A0 Auto Baud Rate Control register

field.name: UCDELIMx
field.description: Break/synch delimiter length in bit times. 0: 1; 1: 2; 2: 3; 3: 4

field.name: UCSTOE
field.description: Synch field timeout error (0: no error; 1: length of break field exceeded measurable time)

field.name: UCBTOE
field.description: Break timeout error (0: no error; 1: length of break field > 22 bit times)

field.name: UCABDEN
field.description: Auto Baud Rate Detection enable (0: disable; 1: enable)

field.name: UCIRTXPLx
field.description: Transmit pulse length. Pulse length tPULSE = (UCIRTXPLx + 1) / (2 × fIRTXCLK)

field.name: UCIRTXCLK
field.description: IrDA transmit pulse clock select (0: BRCLK; 1: BITCLK when UCOS16=1, else BRCLK)

field.name: UCIREN
field.description: IrDA encoder/decoder enable (0: disable; 1: enable)

field.name: UCIRRXFLx
field.description: Receive filter length. Minimum pulse length tMIN = (UCIRRXFLx + 1) / (2 × fIRTXCLK)

field.name: UCIRRXPL
field.description: IrDA receive input UCAxRXD polarity (0: IrDA transceiver delivers a high pulse when a light pulse is seen; 1: IrDA transceiver delivers a low pulse when a light pulse is seen

field.name: UCIRRXFE
field.description: IrDA Rx filter enable (0: disable; 1: enable)

field.name: UCCKPH
field.description: Clock phase select (0: Data is changed on the first UCLK edge and captured on the following edge; 1: Data is captured on the first UCLK edge and changed on the following edge)

field.name: UCCKPL
field.description: Clock polarity select (0: inactive low; 1: inactive high)

field.name: UCMSB
field.description: MSB first select (0: LSB first; 1: MSB first)

field.name: UC7BIT
field.description: Character length (0: 7 bit; 1: 8 bit)

field.name: UCMST
field.description: Master mode select (0: slave; 1: master)

field.name: USCIMODEx
field.description: USCI mode: 0 3-pin SPI; 1: 4-pin SPI with UC0STE acitve high; 2: 4-pin SPI with UC0STE acitve low; 3: I2C mode

field.name: UCSYNC
field.description: Synchronous mode enable (0: asynchronous; 1: synchronous)

field.name: UCSSELx
field.description: USCI clock source select(0: N/A; 1: ACLK; 2,3: SMCLK)

field.name: UCSRST
field.description: Software reset enable (0: USCI released for operation; 1: USCI held reset)

field.name: UCLISTEN
field.description: Listen (loopback) mode enable. (0: disable; 1: enable. UCAxTXD is internally fed back to the receiver)

field.name: UCFE
field.description: Framing error flag (0: no error; 1: character received with low stop bit)

field.name: UCOE
field.description: Overrun error flag (0: no error; 1: overrun error occured) This bit is set when a character is transferred into UCAxRXBUF before the previouscharacter was read. UCOE is cleared automatically when UCxRXBUF is read, and must not be cleared bysoftware. Otherwise, it will not function correctly.

field.name: UCBUSY
field.description: READ-ONLY! UCBUSY=1 indicates active transmit or receive operation

field.name: UCCKPH
field.description: Clock phase select (0: Data is changed on the first UCLK edge and captured on the following edge; 1: Data is captured on the first UCLK edge and changed on the following edge)

field.name: UCCKPL
field.description: Clock polarity select (0: inactive low; 1: inactive high)

field.name: UCMSB
field.description: MSB first select (0: LSB first; 1: MSB first)

field.name: UC7BIT
field.description: Character length (0: 7 bit; 1: 8 bit)

field.name: UCMST
field.description: Master mode select (0: slave; 1: master)

field.name: USCIMODEx
field.description: USCI mode: 0 3-pin SPI; 1: 4-pin SPI with UC0STE acitve high; 2: 4-pin SPI with UC0STE acitve low; 3: I2C mode

field.name: UCSYNC
field.description: Synchronous mode enable (0: asynchronous; 1: synchronous)

field.name: UCSSELx
field.description: USCI clock source select(0: N/A; 1: ACLK; 2,3: SMCLK)

field.name: UCSRST
field.description: Software reset enable (0: USCI released for operation; 1: USCI held reset)

field.name: UCLISTEN
field.description: Listen (loopback) mode enable. (0: disable; 1: enable. UCAxTXD is internally fed back to the receiver)

field.name: UCFE
field.description: Framing error flag (0: no error; 1: character received with low stop bit)

field.name: UCOE
field.description: Overrun error flag (0: no error; 1: overrun error occured) This bit is set when a character is transferred into UCAxRXBUF before the previouscharacter was read. UCOE is cleared automatically when UCxRXBUF is read, and must not be cleared bysoftware. Otherwise, it will not function correctly.

field.name: UCBUSY
field.description: READ-ONLY! UCBUSY=1 indicates active transmit or receive operation

field.name: UCCKPH
field.description: Own addressing mode select (0: 7 bit; 1: 10 bit)

field.name: UCCKPL
field.description: Slave addressing mode select (0: 7 bit; 1: 10 bit)

field.name: UCMM
field.description: Multi master environment enable (0: disable; 1: enable)

field.name: UCMST
field.description: Master mode select (0: slave; 1: master)

field.name: USCIMODEx
field.description: USCI mode: 0 3-pin SPI; 1: 4-pin SPI with UC0STE acitve high; 2: 4-pin SPI with UC0STE acitve low; 3: I2C mode

field.name: UCSYNC
field.description: Synchronous mode enable (0: asynchronous; 1: synchronous)

field.name: UCSSELx
field.description: USCI clock source select(0: UCLKI; 1: ACLK; 2,3: SMCLK)

field.name: UCTR
field.description: Trasmitter/receiver select (0: receiver; 1: transmitter)

field.name: UCXNACK
field.description: Transmit NACK (0: acknowledge normally; 1: generate NACK)

field.name: UCXSTP
field.description: Transmit STOP condition in master mode (0: enable; 1: disable)

field.name: UCXSTT
field.description: Transmit START condition in master mode (0: enable; 1: disable)

field.name: UCSRST
field.description: Software reset enable (0: USCI released for operation; 1: USCI held reset)

field.name: UCSCLLOW
field.description: SCL low (0: SCL is not held low; 1: SCL is held low

field.name: UCGC
field.description: General call address received (0: no general call address received; 1: general call address received)

field.name: UCBBUSY
field.description: Bus busy (0: bus inactive; 1: bus busy)

field.name: NACK
field.description: Not-acknowledge received interrupt flag

field.name: UCSTPIFG
field.description: STOP condidtion interrupt flag

field.name: UCSTTIFG
field.description: START condidtion interrupt flag

field.name: UCALIFG
field.description: Arbitration lost interrupt flag

field.name: UCGGEN
field.description: General call response enable (0: disable; 1: enable)

field.name: IC2OAx
field.description: I2C own address

field.name: IC2OAx
field.description: I2C own address

field.name: UCNACKIE
field.description: Not-acknowledge interrupt enable

field.name: UCSTPIE
field.description: Stop condition interrupt enable

field.name: UCSTTIE
field.description: Start condition interrupt enable

field.name: UCALIE
field.description: Arbitration lost interrupt enable

field.name: SREFx
field.description: Reference select bits

field.name: ADC10SHT
field.description: Sample-and-hold time (0: 4; 1: 8; 2: 16; 3: 64; xADC10CLKs)

field.name: ADC10SR
field.description: Sampling rate limit (0: 200ksps; 1: 50ksps

field.name: REFOUT
field.description: Reference output (0: reference output off; 1: reference output on VeREF+/VREF+ pin

field.name: REFBURST
field.description: 0: refernce buffer on continuously; 1: reference buffer on only during sample and conversion

field.name: MSC
field.description: Multiple sample and conversion enable (0: disable; 1: enable. New conversion starts right after previous one is completed

field.name: REF2_5V
field.description: Reference generator voltage (0: 1.5V; 1: 2.5V)

field.name: REFON
field.description: Reference generator ON/OFF (0: off; 1: on)

field.name: ADC10ON
field.description: ADC ON/OFF (0: off; 1: on)

field.name: ADC10IE
field.description: ADC interrupt enable

field.name: ADC10IFG
field.description: ADC interrupt flag

field.name: ENC
field.description: Enable conversion bit

field.name: ADC10SC
field.description: Start conversion bit

field.name: INCHx
field.description: ADC input channel select

field.name: SHSx
field.description: Sample-and-hold source select (0: AD10SC bit; 1: TimerA0.OUT1; 2: TimerA0.OUT0; 3: TimerA0.OUT2

field.name: ADC10DF
field.description: ADC data format (0: binary; 1: 2's complement)

field.name: ISSH
field.description: Invert signal sample-and-hold (0: off; 1: on)

field.name: ADC10DIVx
field.description: ADC clock divider; Equals ADC10DIV+1

field.name: ADC10SSELx
field.description: ADC clock source select (0: ADC10OSC; 1: ACLK; 2: MCLK; 3: SMCLK

field.name: CONSEQx
field.description: Conversion sequence mode (0: Single-channel-single-conversion; 1: Sequence-of-channels; 2: Repeat-single-channel; 3: Repeat-sequence-of-channels

field.name: ADC10BUSY
field.description: ADC10 busy flag (0: no operation active; 1: ADC busy)

field.name: ADC10TB
field.description: ADC10 two block transfer mode enable (0: disable; 1: enable)

field.name: ADC10CT
field.description: ADC10 continuous transfer enable (0: disable; 1: enable)

field.name: ADC10B1
field.description: ADC10 block one (0: block 2 is filled; 1: block 1 is filled)

field.name: ADC10FETCH
field.description: This bit should be normally reeset

field.name: ADC10SAx
field.description: ADC10 start address for data transfer

field.name: CAEX
field.description: Input terminal exchange (0: off; 1: on)

field.name: CARSEL
field.description: Reference terminal select (0: +; 1: -; opposite when CAEX=1)

field.name: CAREFx
field.description: Reference selection (0: external; 1: 0.25xVcc; 2: 0.5xVcc; 3: diode)

field.name: CAON
field.description: Comparator A+ on (0: off; 1: on)

field.name: CAIES
field.description: Comparator A+ interrupt edege select (0: rising; 1: falling)

field.name: CAIE
field.description: Comparator A+ interrupt enable

field.name: CAIFG
field.description: Comparator A+ interrupt flag

field.name: CASHORT
field.description: Input terminals shorted (0: inputs not shorted; 1: inputs shorted)

field.name: P2CAx
field.description: Comparator A+ terminal select. See datasheet for details

field.name: CAF
field.description: Comparator A+ output filter enable (0: disable; 1: enable)

field.name: CAOUT
field.description: Comparator A+ output
